resources.string: Please select the services you would like to see movies and TV shows from:
Four denizers in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.
The search feature isn\'t ready for aplha release
Hey from our Android development team! We are Erin, Saleh and Kaivan. Computer Science students at the University of Texas at Austin. This is our first Android app.

string-array.name: movie_plots
string-array.item: Four denizers in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.
The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.

The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China\'s fate hangs in the balance: However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a tyro in martial arts.
During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.
When Louis Bloom, a driven man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.
Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.
In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
In London for the Prime Minister\'s funeral, Mike Banning discovers a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.
A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.
